# Website Structure

-   **Homepage**: Introduction, Education, Interest & contact info\
-   **Digital Marketing Projects**: Campaigns, tools, and analytics\
    - Bachelor and Graduate Project\
-   **Marketing Analytics**: Data visualization & modeling\
    - SEO/Email marketing/Social Media marketing analytics\
-   **Presentation**: Website Proposal Slide\

# Project Section Layout

- Projects are showcased using a **card-style layout** with title and summary on "Digital Marketing Projects" and "Marketing Analytics" pages.  
- Clicking on each card reveals **more detail** on objectives, tools, and insights.
